@{EventID=1; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; Company=Microsoft Corporation; IntegrityLevel=High; ParentCommandLine=powershell.exe  -WindowStyle hidden -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -Version 5.1 -s -NoLogo -NoProfile; Hashes=MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Description=Windows PowerShell}

@{EventID=1; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Description=Windows PowerShell; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation; IntegrityLevel=High; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /c start /min "" powershell.exe -WindowStyle hidden  -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; Hashes=MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CommandLine=powershell.exe  -WindowStyle hidden  -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800)}

@{EventID=1; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Company=Microsoft Corporation; ParentImage=C:\Windows\Temp\myRdpService.exe; Description=Windows PowerShell; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=System; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\Temp\myRdpService.exe khiem3; Hashes=MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CommandLine="powershell.exe" -command "Restart-Service TermService -Force"; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800)}

@{Hashes=MD5=04029E121A0CFA5991749937DD22A1D9,SHA256=9F914D42706FE215501044ACD85A32D58AAEF1419D404FDDFA5D3B48F66CCD9F,IMPHASH=7C955A0ABC747F57CCC4324480737EF7; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine=cmd.exe /c start /min "" powershell.exe -WindowStyle hidden -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine=powershell.exe  -WindowStyle hidden -NoLogo -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy bypass -EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects local user creation on Windows servers, which shouldn't happen in an Active Directory environment. Apply this Sigma Use Case on your Windows server logs and not on your DC logs.

match_context.values:
@{EventID=4720; UserWorkstations=%%1793; PrimaryGroupId=513; DisplayName=%%1793; SamAccountName=User1; UserParameters=%%1793; NewUacValue=21; UserAccountControl=
		%%2080
		%%2082
		%%2084; LogonHours=%%1797; SubjectUserName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6$; TargetSid=S-1-5-21-1015118539-3749460369-599379286-1002; TargetDomainName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6; SubjectLogonId=999; ScriptPath=%%1793; HomeDirectory=%%1793; HomePath=%%1793; TargetUserName=User1; ProfilePath=%%1793; SubjectUserSid=S-1-5-18; SubjectDomainName=WORKGROUP}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a PowerShell process that initiates network connections. Check for suspicious target ports and target systems.

match_context.values: @{EventID=3; DestinationPortName=domain; Protocol=udp; Initiated=true; DestinationIp=808:808:1e2c:1e32:15e0:1256:1214:1a00; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; DestinationPort=53; SourcePort=57587; SourceIsIpv6=true; DestinationIsIpv6=true; SourceIp=c0a8:20c:9519:d701:f800:fd82:89a8:ffff}

@{EventID=3; DestinationPortName=https; SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationIp=104.21.37.40; Initiated=true; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; DestinationPort=443; SourcePort=49699; Protocol=tcp; SourceHostname=DESKTOP-B0T93D6.local; SourceIp=192.168.2.12; DestinationIsIpv6=false}

@{EventID=3; DestinationPortName=domain; Protocol=udp; DestinationIp=808:808:1e2c:1e32:15e0:1256:1214:1a00; Initiated=true; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; DestinationPort=53; SourcePort=53971; SourceIsIpv6=true; DestinationIsIpv6=true; SourceIp=c0a8:20c:9519:d701:f800:fd82:89a8:ffff}

@{EventID=3; DestinationPortName=https; Protocol=tcp; DestinationIp=104.21.37.40; Initiated=true; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; DestinationPort=443; SourcePort=49702; SourceIsIpv6=false; SourceHostname=DESKTOP-B0T93D6.local; SourceIp=192.168.2.12; DestinationIsIpv6=false}

@{EventID=3; DestinationPortName=http; Protocol=tcp; DestinationIp=104.21.37.40; Initiated=true; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; DestinationPort=80; SourcePort=49718; SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationIsIpv6=false; SourceIp=192.168.2.12; SourceHostname=DESKTOP-B0T93D6.local}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: A Member Was Added to a Security-Enabled Global Group
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects activity when a member is added to a security-enabled global group

match_context.values: @{EventID=4728; MemberSid=S-1-5-21-1015118539-3749460369-599379286-1002; SubjectUserName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6$; TargetDomainName=DESKTOP-B0T93D6; SubjectDomainName=WORKGROUP; TargetUserName=None; TargetSid=S-1-5-21-1015118539-3749460369-599379286-513; SubjectUserSid=S-1-5-18; SubjectLogonId=999}
